<title level="1" right="Rules">[Focus Spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=1443)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A focus spell is unique to a class and reflects its individual role and style. This section introduces focus spells for the oracle and witch and presents several new options for some _Core Rulebook_ classes. The full rules for casting focus spells appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
